title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti in salted water. Fry pancetta until crisp. Beat the eggs with cheese, season with pepper. Toss the spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.
